knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r echo=FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
library(scales)
library(readr)  
library(cli)
})

f_in_list <- Sys.glob('./pal_*.txt')
names(f_in_list) <- gsub(x=basename(f_in_list), pattern = '\\.txt', replacement = '') 

pal_list <- lapply(f_in_list, readr::read_lines)
```

```{r echo=FALSE} 
cli::cli_alert_info(c("There are ", length(pal_list), " palettes."))
cli::cli_ol(names(f_in_list))
```
```{r echo=FALSE} 
for (pal in names(pal_list)) {
  print(pal)
  print(pal_list[[pal]])
  scales::show_col(pal_list[[pal]])
}
```
